ygData.subject: Re: NURF
ygData.msgSnippet: That might be true. I am only level 15, however one of the reasons that this does not bother me is that it takes me a long time to level. At the rate I am
ygData.messageBody:
That might be true. I am only level 15, however one of the reasons that
this does not bother me is that it takes me a long time to level. At
the rate I am going, I should hit level 30 right around christmas. I
suppose then I will see problems. *grin* Of course, thats several more
months of enjoying the game. By then, who knows what will hold my
interest. Perhaps I will start playin AC, or maybe take up underwater
basket weaving. :)

Trizzen 15th level necromancer

> Actually the extra ticks mean nothing in a group
> since you rarely get a dot
> to even do more then 3/4 damage before the patch
> since the creature was
> taken out so quickly. Believe me you can have a lot
> of friends but you'll
> find that there not on all the time. Friends help
> but it doesn't solve the
> problem.
>
> Naeeldar
